name: Demolition Derby 2019
description:
CAN YOU SURVIVE THIS DEATH RACE? Destroy cars and watch the extreme mayhem you cause in this banger racing game!
Derby Demolition 2019 is a thrilling, action packed, adrenaline-filled vehicular destruction game. 
There are NO RULES in this extreme motorsport game! Just crash and bang into other cars around you, destroy them all, until only your car is left!

Each level of Derby Demolition 2019 has a different mission that you must complete to win the level. Survive in the arena and destroy the minimum number of cars shown in each level to go on to the next.
 Hit the RAM button to crash into other cars at a high speed or even to evade other drivers. 
Set off TRAPS to snare your opponents, but be careful not to get caught in one yourself!

  Unlock the many typical ALL AMERICAN MUSCLE CARS available in Derby Demolition 2019. Win levels to earn coins and upgrade your cars with different accessories like fenders and steel meshes, to make them tougher and meaner. Play in different arenas, under different weather conditions.

Derby Demolition 2019 is an arcade game with different game play MODES, LEVELS, UPGRADES and more.

Drive your car fast and RACE to the finish line! 

Destroy the minimum number of cars shown and perform specific tasks within a certain TIME limit to progress to the next level. 

Play CHALLENGE levels in an arena suspended in the air. Crash and push your opponent cars off the arena but don’t fall yourself!

The CLASSIC mode is the survival mode. Crash and hit other cars until you are the last one standing. It’s the survival of the fittest!

 Compete with others around the globe! We are working on real time MULTIPLAYER and will launch that soon!  

FEATURES of Derby Demolition 2019 -
- Heavy American muscle cars
- Full car customization
- Realistic car physics
- Real-time vehicle destruction and damage
- Different arenas to choose from
- Smooth car controls
- Realistic car crashing sounds
- Real time Multiplayer - Coming soon!
- Free Game

Crashes, smashes, twisting metal and burning rubber - you don’t want to miss one shred of the excitement of the Demolition Derby 2019! 
Play now and get wrecking! Become the Derby Demolition Champion!
